alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; North Big Horn Basin; Northeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 12:20AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Johnson and southeastern Big Horn Counties through 100 AM MDT... At 1219 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Upper Medicine Lodge Lake, which is also 28 miles north of Ten Sleep, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Johnson and southeastern Big Horn Counties, including the following locations... Shell Creek Campground. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 42 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; North Big Horn Basin; Northeast Johnson County
